column1:
Topping the movie box office charts this year, Barbie takes first place with an impressive $1,445,638,421. This beloved doll's leap to the big screen captured the hearts of audiences worldwide.
Coming in second is The Super Mario Bros Movie, a nostalgic journey that delighted fans and amassed $1,362,034,072.
In third place is Oppenheimer, a gripping historical drama, drew in viewers and earned $975,781,237. The film explores the life and moral dilemmas of physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer.
Fourth place goes to Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3, which continued the thrilling adventures of our favorite intergalactic heroes, grossing $845,555,777. Filled with humor, heart, and dazzling visual effects, the film delivers another epic saga for fans of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Rounding out the top five is Fast X, the latest installment in the high-octane Fast & Furious franchise, which sped to $714,582,375. With its adrenaline-fueled action and star-studded cast, the film promises non-stop excitement for audiences worldwide.
